metadata.title: Cactus Work Boots 6727M Light Brown Size
features: The CACTUS 627M is designed for maximum durability and long-lasting comfort, reinforced by a traditional Goodyear Welt Construction which also molds to the individual wearer’s feet over time. Made with 100% American oil-tumbled full-grain leather, this upper is soft and durable, while simultaneously helping keep your feet dry. This boot also features our dual-density sole, composed of both rubber and polyurethane, so that you don’t have to choose between a strong and lightweight boot any longer.
GENUINE GOODYEAR WELT CONSTRUCTION - Heavy-duty Goodyear Welt Construction famous for its long-lasting capabilities, molds to your feet and adds a protective layer against water-intrusion.

LIGHT & MIGHTY DUAL DENSITY OUTSOLE - The dual-density outsole consists of both rubber and polyurethane (PU), so that you don’t have to choose between durability and comfort. This uniquely crafted outsole also features excellent wear-resistance, shock absorption, is lighter, and is both oil- and slip-resistant.

RESILIENT & LONG-LASTING REMOVABLE PU FOOTBED - A more expensive footbed, the polyurethane footbed is known for its resilience and durability. It has a higher specific density which lends to its ability to neither compress nor conform despite heavy usage over a long period of time.
Note from the Manufacturer: 3-MONTH MANUFACTURER WARRANTY and May Run ½ Size Larger than Other Brands
description: The CACTUS 627 Moccasin-Toe 6-inch work boot is your classic, staple work boot. Made with 100% American oil-tumbled full-grain leather, this upper is soft and durable, while simultaneously helping keep your feet dry. The 627M was designed for maximum durability and long-lasting comfort, reinforced by a traditional Goodyear Welt Construction which also molds to the individual wearer’s feet over time, and donned with a cushioning EVA footbed and lining, absorbing impact in each and every step. This boot also features our dual-density sole, composed of both rubber and polyurethane, so that you don’t have to choose between a strong and lightweight boot any longer. Available in 9 styles, find your next go-to work boot here.
